summary: This document contains the Articles of Incorporation for Nautilus, Inc., a corporation established in the U.S. Virgin Islands. It outlines the corporation's purpose, management structure, and the names of its initial directors and officers, including Jeffrey Epstein. The document also includes various annual reports and financial statements for the corporation over several years.

connections.description: Jeffrey E. Epstein is the President of Nautilus, Inc., and Richard Kahn serves as Treasurer.
Jeffrey E. Epstein is the President of Nautilus, Inc., and Darren Indyke serves as Vice President.
Both Richard Kahn and Darren Indyke serve as directors of Nautilus, Inc.

events.title: Incorporation of Nautilus, Inc.

keyFacts: Nautilus, Inc. was incorporated on November 22, 2011.
The corporation is authorized to issue 10,000 shares of common stock.
Jeffrey E. Epstein serves as the President and Director of Nautilus, Inc.
Richard Kahn serves as the Treasurer and Director of Nautilus, Inc.
Darren Indyke serves as the Vice President and Secretary of Nautilus, Inc.
